name: The Runs (bitonicsoft)
description:
There’s a malcontent growing, a rumbling deep within. When nature calls, when you have to go, when the power within grows too strong, you have no choice but to delay the inevitable struggle all mankind has come to know.

Don’t wait. Don’t walk. You’ve got The Runs!

INSTRUCTIONS
  • Windows
    • Unzip the directory
    • Double click TheRuns.exe
  • Linux
    • Use your package manager to install libsfml-dev (example: sudo apt install libsfml-dev)
    • Unzip the tarball
    • Navigate in terminal to the game directory and run the executable with ./TheRuns
BUG FIXES
  • Patch 1
    • Removed the threaded resource loader as it seemed to be causing issues with Linux and rarely Windows.
    • Fixed a single misplaced tile.
KEYS
  • WASD/Arrow keys - Navigate
  • Space - Confirm
  • Esc - Menu
